org.dkpro.statistics.agreement

Interface IAgreementMeasure

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IChanceCorrectedAgreement, IChanceCorrectedDisagreement, ICodingAgreementMeasure, IUnitizingAgreementMeasure
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AgreementMeasure, BennettSAgreement, CodingAgreementMeasure, CohenKappaAgreement, DisagreementMeasure, FleissKappaAgreement, HubertKappaAgreement, KrippendorffAlphaAgreement, KrippendorffAlphaUnitizingAgreement, PercentageAgreement, RandolphKappaAgreement, ScottPiAgreement, UnitizingAgreementMeasure, WeightedAgreement, WeightedKappaAgreement

    public interface IAgreementMeasure
    Generic interface that is to be implemented by all inter-rater agreement measures. The basic idea is to calculate a numerical score for a given IAnnotationStudy.
    Author:
    Christian M. Meyer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double calculateAgreement()
      Returns the inter-rater agreement score.

    • Method Detail

      • calculateAgreement

        double calculateAgreement()
        Returns the inter-rater agreement score. Unless otherwise indicated, the result is between -1 and +1, where +1 indicates perfect agreement, 0 indicates no agreement or that the agreement can be fully explained by chance, and -1 indicates perfect disagreement.
